BackstoryDef.title: beggar’s eye
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: There is a Yaoma platitude reminding children to act properly in public: “Nobody escapes a beggar’s sight”. [PAWN_nameDef] can attest to that, having served as one of many eyes of an information broker. For a child, [PAWN_pronoun] was exceptionally crafty with [PAWN_possessive] tongue and hands, able to glean information through conversation and trickery.

BackstoryDef.title: diaspora delinquent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the streets of a neon-lit urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] felt out of place when performing the Yaoma traditions of [PAWN_possessive] parents. So [PAWN_pronoun] ended up getting involved in organized crime, working [PAWN_possessive] way up into becoming a full-fledged gang member. After [PAWN_pronoun] cajoled and rioted for a couple of years, [PAWN_pronoun] returned home, having learned a lesson on the meaning of community.

BackstoryDef.title: gongsi intern
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Quick of mind, [PAWN_nameDef] worked [PAWN_possessive] way into the offices of a Yaoma business. [PAWN_pronoun] swiftly picked up a firm understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] employer operated from those [PAWN_possessive] worked with. At the end of [PAWN_possessive] time with the company, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive]self with a coveted return offer, due to [PAWN_possessive] work ethic.

BackstoryDef.title: exchange student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of an intercultural program between the Yaoma and other human civilizations, [PAWN_nameDef] studied at a foreign school. [PAWN_pronoun] took part in a varied education, sharing [PAWN_possessive] experiences with other humans. From [PAWN_possessive] time in required coursework and electives, [PAWN_pronoun] developed into an intelligent, artistic soul.

BackstoryDef.title: chef assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_possessive] parents were busy managing an inn, so from an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] was in the kitchen. Though clumsy at first when assisting the line chefs, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually got the hang of the work pace doing food prep and dishwashing. Eventually, at the detriment of [PAWN_possessive] studies, [PAWN_pronoun] had the chance to create a few meals for the tavern.

BackstoryDef.title: game hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In [PAWN_nameDef] parent’s home were taxidermied wild game, some of which [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and killed [PAWN_possessive]self. From [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hold a firearm steady; from [PAWN_possessive] mother, [PAWN_pronoun] studied the characteristics of [PAWN_possessive] prey. In time, [PAWN_nameDef] could track beasts in rough weather, before returning to [PAWN_possessive] sect with the products of [PAWN_possessive] hunt.

BackstoryDef.title: alchemist’s student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] came of age under the care of an alchemist. Under [PAWN_possessive] adoptive parent, [PAWN_pronoun] developed a social deficiency as well as medical capability, picking up the ins and outs of medicinal compounds and their delivery methods. Ultimately, [PAWN_pronoun] became a welcome sight within [PAWN_possessive] community as a healer.

BackstoryDef.title: silkwatcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Under [PAWN_possessive] master’s tutelage, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the properties and manufacturing of silk, gaining the foundational knowledge required to become a competent seamstress. In addition to mastering fundamental skills, [PAWN_pronoun] watched the silkworms under [PAWN_possessive] master’s guidance, harvesting them when they formed their cocoon.

BackstoryDef.title: jadecutter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] knew it took more than a steady hand to become a jadecarver’s apprentice. [PAWN_possessive] unhealthy appreciation of jade led [PAWN_pronoun] to quarry and trade for the jewel under the guidance of [PAWN_possessive] master. From there, [PAWN_pronoun] further processed the gem, learning various hardstone carving techniques firsthand from [PAWN_possessive] teacher.

BackstoryDef.title: contraband courier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into an ailing clan, [PAWN_nameDef] supported [PAWN_possessive] family by discreetly transporting “supplies” for an unknown employer. [PAWN_pronoun] never ascertained who [PAWN_possessive] recipients were, as [PAWN_pronoun] only delivered “goods” to various dead drops, some of which were concealed within mortar or beneath flora. By playing on the biases of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s enforcement, [PAWN_pronoun] was never caught.

BackstoryDef.title: auspicious child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s superstitious family believed [PAWN_pronoun] was born with good fortune, placing great expectations on [PAWN_objective]. Under their care, [PAWN_pronoun] endured [PAWN_possessive] clan’s education, developing proficiency in various spheres from academia to arts and crafts to become the “ideal” Yaoma child. However, this also meant [PAWN_pronoun] rarely had a chance to practice [PAWN_possessive] social skills.

BackstoryDef.title: inauspicious child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: All [PAWN_nameDef] knew was that [PAWN_pronoun] was born under an ill omen- reason enough for [PAWN_possessive] family to worry over [PAWN_possessive] actions. Smothered by [PAWN_possessive] clan’s love, [PAWN_pronoun] made use of [PAWN_possessive] social grace and intellect to soothe their worries. This constant back and forth between [PAWN_objective] and the family stressed [PAWN_objective], which motivated [PAWN_objective] to be more productive.

BackstoryDef.title: young master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was spoiled by [PAWN_possessive] wealthy clan, and pursued a life of leisure. [PAWN_pronoun] made use of [PAWN_possessive] lofty position to network with members of other clans, as well as to train in combat arts. [PAWN_possessive] status, however, left [PAWN_objective] with a disdain for manual labor.

BackstoryDef.title: trafficking victim
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abducted from [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_nameDef] was put to work in a foreign land. [PAWN_pronoun] labored at construction and mining, and was left to feed [PAWN_possessive]self with rations and wild plants. Eventually, Yaoma mercenaries rescued [PAWN_pronoun], but the damage was done: [PAWN_pronoun] withdrew into [PAWN_possessive]self, even in the safety of [PAWN_possessive] adoptive family’s home.

BackstoryDef.title: research patient
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born with a rare condition, whose aftereffect made [PAWN_objective] chronically vulnerable to disease, [PAWN_nameDef] caught the attention of union doctors. [PAWN_pronoun] spent a portion of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a lab that studied [PAWN_possessive] ailment, and between daily visits from [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_pronoun] absorbed medical knowledge from [PAWN_possesive] caretakers. Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] was treated for [PAWN_possessive] illness.

BackstoryDef.title: daostudent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: At a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] pursued academia in the hope of contributing to the Great Dao, associating the Great Dao with virtue. Thus, [PAWN_pronoun] attended an excessive amount of lectures, developing an inquisitive nature. This passion, however, alienated other children of [PAWN_possessive] age, leading to a rather solitary childhood.

BackstoryDef.title: expeditionary trainee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in a Yaoma cult program that served as one of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s pipelines between primary education and the armed forces. [PAWN_pronoun] explored low-risk areas, and took lessons from senior members of [PAWN_possessive] expeditionary team on marksmanship, emergency first aid, and ecology.

BackstoryDef.title: woodworker’s pupil
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] picked up both hammer and chisel in [PAWN_possessive] childhood, and went under the tutelage of a carpenter in service of [PAWN_possessive] sect. [PAWN_pronoun] trained to process a plethora of wood types, enough to theoretically employ their unique properties for either construction or woodcarving.

BackstoryDef.title: merchant’s child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Surrounded by [PAWN_possessive] family’s hard earned wealth, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up intrinsically understanding “value”. [PAWN_pronoun] observed both civil and discordant negotiations between [PAWN_possessive] parents and their clients, and developed a distaste for physical violence. By the time [PAWN_pronoun] joined [PAWN_possessive] family’s caravans, [PAWN_pronoun] had a firm business foundation.

BackstoryDef.title: sword disciple
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took to swordplay as part of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s martial education, catching the attention of a swordmaster. Under [PAWN_possessive] master’s stringent instruction, [PAWN_pronoun] grasped proper form during [PAWN_possessive] spars with [PAWN_possessive] teacher. This extensive muscle and close-quarters training made [PAWN_objective] proficient in melee, but left habits that were counterproductive for ranged combat.

BackstoryDef.title: musical neophyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: There was an elegance to Yaoma musical tradition that appealed to [PAWN_nameDef], and so [PAWN_pronoun] sought to pursue the art. From the airy notes of the flute to the warm tone of the erhu, [PAWN_pronoun] explored every instrument [PAWN_pronoun] came across. In this way, [PAWN_pronoun] built a solid foundation for [PAWN_possessive]self in the performance and appreciation of music.

BackstoryDef.title: prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The most defining aspect of [PAWN_nameDef]’s childhood was how banal it was. [PAWN_pronoun] found that whatever [PAWN_pronoun] touched at [PAWN_possessive] sect posed little challenge to pick up, from philosophy to calligraphy. This isolated [PAWN_objective] from [PAWN_possessive] envious peers, which further sapped [PAWN_possessive] motivation to be productive.

BackstoryDef.title: meditative trainee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to a temple to reflect on [PAWN_possessive] actions, in the hope that [PAWN_pronoun]’d learn self-control. [PAWN_possessive] time was spent cleaning the ancestral shrines, as well as cooking vegetarian meals for the site’s curators. [PAWN_possessive] activities gave [PAWN_objective] the time to temper [PAWN_possessive] own attitude.

BackstoryDef.title: xide xiaoje
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born in an emotionally absent household, [PAWN_nameDef] isolated [PAWN_possessive]self from [PAWN_possessive] family and neighbors. [PAWN_pronoun] inundated [PAWN_possessive]self with entertainment, even optimizing [PAWN_pronoun] gameplay to manipulate the very ticks of [PAWN_possessive] favorite MMORPG. This excessive devotion to technology had [PAWN_possessive] derisively labeled as a “xide xiaoje”: a mistress to silicon.

BackstoryDef.title: exiled juvenile
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After failing to live up to the expectations of [PAWN_possessive] clan, [PAWN_nameDef] was disinherited and banished from the household. [PAWN_pronoun] was subsequently raised by an elder of another sect, and by [PAWN_possessive] request received training on how to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own within the wilderness.

BackstoryDef.title: culinary scholar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] elected to take courses on culinary traditions and techniques that were offered by [PAWN_possessive] palace sect; from there, [PAWN_possessive] academics became a hobby. [PAWN_pronoun] joined a research group that traced the lineage of foods and their regional variants that popped up as a result of culture, resources, and history.

BackstoryDef.title: agricultural understudy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Coming from a rural family, [PAWN_nameDef]’s thoughts turned to home while studying at [PAWN_possessive] sect. These musings became the motivation for [PAWN_objective] to investigate every facet of farming with the guidance of a palace elder: how to improve crop yields, how to efficiently harvest, how to selectively breed seed, and so on. [PAWN_pronoun] hoped that [PAWN_possessive] research would aid [PAWN_possessive] home community’s livelihood.

BackstoryDef.title: ranged disciple
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of the martial curriculum at [PAWN_possessive] sect, [PAWN_nameDef] focused on polishing [PAWN_possessive] marksmanship. [PAWN_pronoun] became well acquainted with ballistics as well as the proper handling of firearms and other projectile weapons, enough to semi-reliably hit [PAWN_possessive] targets.

BackstoryDef.title: architectural aide
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] interned at an union construction firm, temping under a team of designers and engineers. [PAWN_pronoun] gained first-hand experience from the program through [PAWN_possessive] exposure to technical drawing sessions, structural load calculations, and building specifications. The experience left [PAWN_objective] with an appreciation for [PAWN_possessive] sect’s appearance.

BackstoryDef.title: line assembler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Taking on a part-time job at a palace-owned workshop, [PAWN_nameDef] made use of [PAWN_possessive] dexterity and spatial awareness to assemble a myriad of products. [PAWN_pronoun] conducted quality checks as well as joined together components, enabling [PAWN_possessive] employer to pass the final product to other palace businesses.

BackstoryDef.title: tea picker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] supported the Yaoma tea industry as one of the many hands on a palace tea farm. Taking the instructions of the landowner, [PAWN_pronoun] watched the trees for disease between flushes, and gathered the freshest leaves during the harvests. The role attuned [PAWN_objective] to minute factors that could affect the shrub’s growth, granting [PAWN_objective] a bit of a green thumb.

BackstoryDef.title: mercenary recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted by a mercenary during a tour to a Yaoma community. Surviving many combat encounters, [PAWN_pronoun] understood how to cut flesh and shoot men before [PAWN_pronoun] had ever gone to school. While [PAWN_pronoun] eventually received primary education at a sectct, [PAWN_possessive] academic performance was stunted by [PAWN_possessive] focus on the battlefront- the only place [PAWN_pronoun] felt she belonged.
